content: Countervailing duty laws aim to help domestic industries affected by subsidized imports, imposing additional import duties equal to the estimated subsidy amount. Relief requires proof of material injury to the domestic industry and subsidy of the imports. In a 2007 investigation on Chinese paper imports, the ITA found ways to identify subsidies despite previous reluctance to apply CVD laws to nonmarket economy countries like China.
